title: Swarna Kamala Karnam - Diamond Floral Stud Earrings
materials: ethically sourced Natural Diamonds. Features a radiant Hyderabadi polish for enduring luster.
features: Inspired by the lotus flower, a symbol of purity and prosperity. Delicate openwork filigree design adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds. Exquisite craftsmanship showcasing a modern take on traditional floral motifs. Secured with comfortable and durable post backs.
occasions: or baby showers (seemantham). Also suitable for contemporary events and gatherings.
description: A timeless design that seamlessly blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The high-quality gold and diamonds ensure lasting beauty and value. Comfortable and easy to wear, making it ideal for daily wear. Symbolizes purity and prosperity, making it a meaningful gift. Handcrafted with precision in Hyderabad by skilled artisans, ensuring superior craftsmanship.
